snippet.title: Dead By Daylight - Announce Trailer - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Dead by Daylight is a multiplayer (4vs1) horror game where one player takes on the role of the savage Killer, and the other four players play as Survivors, trying to escape the Killer and avoid being caught and killed. Dead by Daylight is coming to Nintendo Switch this fall.

#DeadByDaylight #NintendoSwitch #NintendoDirect

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot
